Public Member Functions

CosineDihedral Class Reference
Dihedral Interactions

Detailed Description

A four-body dihedral potential.

Simple dihedral potential: kappa [1 - cos(theta)], where theta is the dihedral angle.

Definition at line 30 of file CosineDihedral.h.

#include <CosineDihedral.h>
